A Goal.name: A Goal
A Goal.description: A montage where you work towards a goal. Practicing an impossible trick in the driveway, building something no one believes in, saving change in a jar, etc.

Actually Reads the Manual..name: Actually Reads the Manual.
Actually Reads the Manual..description: You can break mods down into components and install new mods on the fly. It takes either an action roll or a few minutes.

Angst.name: Angst
Angst.description: You've got issues. Do we know why? How do they show? Pick a teammate who notices.

Being Good.name: Being Good
Being Good.description: Chores, homework, Bible study, showing up for your shift on time. You know, actually trying.

Button Masher.name: Button Masher
Button Masher.description: Mark 1 turbo to use a locked mod for the length of one action—or 2 turbo if the mod is from another device. Potential problems are worse.

Catching Feelings.name: Catching Feelings
Catching Feelings.description: The relationship blooms, but things get more complicated, too. What’s at stake? Which teammate disapproves?

Catharsis.name: Catharsis
Catharsis.description: Who helps you? What do you understand now that you didn't before? What will you change?

Caught in a Plot.name: Caught in a Plot
Caught in a Plot.description: You overhear something, get mistaken for someone, get ushered into the wrong line, etc.

Challenge.name: Challenge
Challenge.description: Something not-so-great happens to the crew.

Dalliance.name: Dalliance
Dalliance.description: You begin a special relationship with a member of another faction, a teammate, or someone else.

Darkness.name: Darkness
Darkness.description: You are not okay. Your issues hurt your own crew. How? What did you say? What did you do? What did you not do?

Devotion.name: Devotion
Devotion.description:
Look through your crew’s photos, daydream about portals, feel the wind in your face as you skate.
Show us what you care about, and how much.

Diligent.name: Diligent
Diligent.description: You can reroll In the Lab. Also clear +1 trouble when Being Good once per downtime.

Double Dare.name: Double Dare
Double Dare.description: Instead of taking a dare, you can mark 2 trouble for +2d6 or +2 kick to an action roll

Fight.name: Fight
Fight.description: An argument, betrayal, or broken bond. How does each participant feel threatened by this issue? Hear everything as an attack, speak in accusations, and focus on winning.

Final Warning.name: Final Warning
Final Warning.description: An argument, punishment, or ultimatum. What do they want? What do you? What don't they understand? What don't you?

Full Realization.name: Full Realization
Full Realization.description: And just like that, it snaps together. Who or what helped you see the missing piece?

Going Solo.name: Going Solo
Going Solo.description: You have a big fight with your crew, choosing yourself over them. It eats at you.

Grinding.name: Grinding
Grinding.description: A scene where you work hard, prep carefully, wait patiently, fall and get back up, etc.

In Too Deep.name: In Too Deep
In Too Deep.description: You’re found out, painted into a corner, caught franticly Mrs. Doubtfiring at an event, and just in way over your head. Pick a teammate who notices.

In the Lab.name: In the Lab
In the Lab.description:
Tinkering, designing, crafting, shopping, etc. Do any of the following:
* Install a mod you have components for.
* Uninstall mods and salvage the components.
* Exchange three matching components for one component of your choice.
* Roll to gain a random component.

Inspiration.name: Inspiration
Inspiration.description: A big idea strikes you, gnawing at your mind and flooding you with adrenaline. Do we know what it is yet? You drop everything to go work on it. Pick a teammate who was there.

Intuition.name: Intuition
Intuition.description: You can always tell who likes/dislikes who, what someone really wants, and if someone’s vibes are off.

Just Vibin'.name: Just Vibin'
Just Vibin'.description: You just being you. Playing video games, sleeping, eatin’ chips, chasing butterflies, whatever. Show us how care-free you are.

Last Straw.name: Last Straw
Last Straw.description: Nuclear war, scorched-earth, and words you both regret. What's the crew think?
Last Straw.reward: +1 slam (grounded, lost device, etc.) and +1 doom

Lateral Thinking..name: Lateral Thinking.
Lateral Thinking..description: When you try a trick with a creative approach, mark 1 style even on a failed roll.

Love Conquers All.name: Love Conquers All
Love Conquers All.description: You make it right, prove your loyalty, speak truth and do the brave thing. Your bonds are stronger then ever.

Lucky.name: Lucky
Lucky.description: Once per run, dumb luck helps you. A tree falls on a monster, lasers miss as you tie your shoes, you unknowingly give someone a perfect gift, etc.

Make Up.name: Make Up
Make Up.description: An apology, kind gesture, or regrown bond. A conversation where you really listen, address those core concerns, and tell the others how you feel, not how they are wrong.

Middle Finger.name: Middle Finger
Middle Finger.description: Once per run, automatically get a 6 on any action, no roll required. Add up to 2 kick, baby. Nothing can stand in your way.

Opportunity.name: Opportunity
Opportunity.description: Something great happens to the crew.

Origin Story.name: Origin Story
Origin Story.description: A flashback that shows a defining moment from your past.

Pep Talk.name: Pep Talk
Pep Talk.description: Once per run, refill 3 hype or clear a slam for a teammate. What do they need to hear the most right now?

Perseverance.name: Perseverance
Perseverance.description: You get back up and keep going. You always do. Who believed in you?

Portal Discovery.name: Portal Discovery
Portal Discovery.description: Exploring, eavesdropping, crunching data, scouring old message boards, etc.

Power User..name: Power User.
Power User..description: Gain a secondary signature of your choosing. It shares the turbo pool of your primary one and has space for one mod (sold seperately).

Quitting.name: Quitting
Quitting.description: The moment you finally give up. Why? What broke you? Who have you let down, besides yourself?

Redemption.name: Redemption
Redemption.description: Who makes the first move toward forgiveness? What's changed? How will you treat each other differently now?

Research.name: Research
Research.description: A scene of you exploring, reading, analyzing a video, being creative, trying something new, planning portal routes, etc.

Results.name: Results
Results.description: The idea shows promise. Is it some kind of device, a new trick, a portaling breakthrough, or what? Pick a teammate who is there when you test it.

Sacrifice Your Body.name: Sacrifice Your Body
Sacrifice Your Body.description: Take a slam (exhausted, strained, etc.) to get +2d6 to your action. This slam can’t be noped or avoided in any way. You gotta actually take it, kid.

Serendipity.name: Serendipity
Serendipity.description: Your moment of dumb luck continues to pay out, but also gets more complex. What does the crew think?

Setback.name: Setback
Setback.description: The work gets harder, progress slows, and now it’s raining. Your goal feels farther away than when you started, but you keep at it. What’s the crew think?

Sharpened.name: Sharpened
Sharpened.description: A teammate inspires you or shows you something about yourself.

Show Off.name: Show Off
Show Off.description: You get +1d6 when you do a trick. You just can’t help it, the spotlight loves you.

Snake.name: Snake
Snake.description: If there is any question about who goes first, it's you.

Somehow Works Out.name: Somehow Works Out
Somehow Works Out.description: And yet, you land on your feet, as per effing usual. That photo becomes a meme, the money was still in your backpack, the CEO liked your initiative, etc.

Spotlight.name: Spotlight
Spotlight.description: You get scouted by a sponsor, become the fan favourite, or get singled out for some kind of reward or accolade. You aren’t humble about it.

Star Power.name: Star Power
Star Power.description:
More attention, more offers. It’s going to your head.
How do you treat your entourage... erh crew?

Steezey.name: Steezey
Steezey.description: Mark 1 style anytime you roll doubles. You look cool without even knowing it.

Struggling.name: Struggling
Struggling.description: Your issues get worse. You act out, project, or try to solve the problem the wrong way.

Swagger.name: Swagger
Swagger.description: A scene where you trash talk a rival, break your own record, comment on your own videos, show up late, or just live life fast and loud.

Take an L.name: Take an L
Take an L.description: You suffer a loss, burn a bridge, gain a debt, or set off a looming threat. Does the crew know?

Team Player.name: Team Player
Team Player.description: Mark 1 style whenever you take (or nope) a slam for someone else.

Technobable..name: Technobable.
Technobable..description: Twice per run, explain something technical with jargon or a fun metaphor for 1 style and +1d6 to a roll.

The I in Team.name: The I in Team
The I in Team.description: You turn down a huge offer, set the record straight, or show up just in time to help, sacrificing your own legacy for the crew.
The I in Team.reward: -1 legacy, -1 doom, -2 fractures, +7 style for your crew, and +1 trait.

Trouble at Home.name: Trouble at Home
Trouble at Home.description: Your family disapproves. How? Why? Do you care? Pick a teammate who notices.

Umm... Guys?.name: Umm... Guys?
Umm... Guys?.description: You accidentally notice the stuff everyone else didn’t, like hidden panels, perfect skate spots, looming monsters, etc.

Unintended Consequences.name: Unintended Consequences
Unintended Consequences.description: The idea goes haywire, dominoes terribly, or gets into the wrong hands. What’s the crew think?

Us or Them.name: Us or Them
Us or Them.description: A misunderstanding, conflict of interest, betrayal, or messy break up hurts you and your crew.

Walk It Off.name: Walk It Off
Walk It Off.description: You gain 1 extra slam box. Mark 1 style every time you take a slam.

Walking Disaster.name: Walking Disaster
Walking Disaster.description: You don’t just flirt with disaster, you’re dating it. You get +1d6 on disaster rolls, and can choose to take a disaster for a willing teammate. If you do, mark 2 style.

You Earned It.name: You Earned It
You Earned It.description: A trophy, a trick named after you, a scholarship, a moment you’ll cherish forever.
